title: Create New Player
custom_steps:
1.Locate New Player tab on left side of app
2.Fill in required Fields
3.Enter Birth Date AFTER 9/1/1995
4.Click Register
custom_expected: After clicking 'Register', International Amateur Player profile should be displayed in edit mode. Data from the widget should be populated into the profile.

title: Verify players names can include spaces
custom_steps:
1. Enter in required fields.
2. For Last name make it "De La Cruz"
3. Click Register
custom_expected: Fields work appropriately and player is registered

title: Verify players names can include special characters
custom_steps:
1. Enter in required fields 
2. For first name enter "D'Angelo" and for last name enter "Mc-Test"
3. Click Register
custom_expected: Fields should work appropriately and player is registered

title: Verify players are created successfully
custom_steps:
1. With profile still in edit mode, fill in all required fields and attach a file with necessary labels.
2. Click Register to submit player
custom_expected:
1. Player is created and user is brought back to the New Player tab.
2. On the Submissions tab, the player created should be at the top of the list with a status of "Ready."

title: Verify player is within age boundaries
custom_steps:
1. Locate New Player tab
2. Fill in Birth Date BEFORE 9/1/1995
3. Fill in all required fields
4. Click Register Button
5. Fill in all required fields
6. Click Register Button, again
custom_expected: An error message should occur that says, "Birth Date cannot be prior to 9/1/1995" with an "OK" button.

title: Verify player is within age boundaries
custom_preconds: Player cannot be younger than 14 years old
custom_steps:
1. Locate New Player tab
2. Fill in Birth Date AFTER 8/5/2001 (making the player younger than 14 years old)
3. Fill in all required fields
4. Click Register Button
5. Fill in all required fields
6. Click Register Button, again
custom_expected: An error message should occur that says, "Birth Date cannot be after 8/5/2001 (player cannot be less than 14 years old)" with an "OK" button.

title: Verify Birthdate dropdown for a non US time zone
custom_steps:
1. Change time zone on iPad from US to non US (ie. London, England)
2. Restart iPad
3. Login to app as BOC
4. Create new player
5. Fill in required fields 
6. For birthdate select a date, then click dropdown again
custom_expected:
1. Time zone changed
2. iPad restarts
3. Dashboard displayed
4. New player screen displayed
5. Fields work appropriately
6. Original date should show on dropdown when clicked a second time

title: Make sure question appears and if answer is yes further questions appear
custom_steps:
1. Following question appears under the info section of a player, ”Has the player ever been to Canada or any of the 50 states of the USA, the District of Columbia(Washington,DC), Puerto Rico , or any other Commonwealth Territory or Possession of the United States of America ? “
2. Select Yes
3. More questions should appear
custom_expected:
Radio buttons should be selectable. Selecting Yes should provide more questions: 
- How many times has the player been to any of the above locations? (Text Field)
- How long was the player's longest stay in any of the above locations? (Text Field)
- Residency follow up needed ? (Radio)
- Please provide the date of the last stay and any additional relevant information that the player provided concerning the above questions

title: Verify Trainer/Agent/League Info fields
custom_steps: Verify the fields for Trainer/Agent/League info
custom_expected:
Following fields should be displayed 
- Type (Trainer/Agent, League)
- Name
- Phone Country
- Phone number
- Email

title: Trainer/Agent/League Info Type: Trainer/Agent
custom_steps:
*Under the Trainer/Agent and League Section*

1. Make Type Trainer/Agent using dropdown
2. Fill out required fields
custom_expected: Pre-existing Trainer/Agents should appear as you type in a name

title: Trainer/Agent/League Info Type: Trainer/Agent
custom_steps:
1. Make Type Trainer/Agent using dropdown 
2. Fill out a name that does not appear in the system
3. Fill out all other required fields to create a new player
4. Click Register button
custom_expected:
An error message should occur that says, "Trainer/Agent/League Please Select Name." 

*Trainer/Agents and Leagues should be at least submitted into the system in order to be utilized by a player*

title: Trainer/Agent/League Info Type: League
custom_steps:
*Under the Trainer/Agent and League Section*

1. Make Type League using dropdown
2. Fill out required fields
custom_expected:
All fields should have a text box to fill out (only Type and Name are required)

No name options will appear while typing in text box

Any League name is accepted - no error message should occur after clicking Register button

title: Verify New Trainer Button
custom_steps:
1. Make Type be Trainer/Agent using dropdown
2. Click the New Trainer button
3. Fill out Required Fields 
4. Click Submit button
custom_expected:
1. New Trainer and Edit Details buttons should appear at the top left of the Trainer/Agent/League Info section
2. User will be brought to a new page with fields to create a new Trainer/Agent
3. First name, Last Name, Country, City are all required
4. User is brought back to the new players profile 

The new Trainer/Agent information should be filled out in Trainer/Agent/League info section

title: Verify Edit Details Button
custom_steps:
1. Make Type be Trainer/Agent
2. Type in Trainer/Agents name
3. Click the Edit Details button
4. Update Trainer/Agent information
5. Click Submit button
custom_expected:
1. New Trainer and Edit Details buttons should appear at top left of the Trainer/Agent/League Info section
2. Trainer/Agents options should appear as you type in a name
3. User will be brought to a new page with fields to edit the Trainer/Agent selected
4. Changes are made and displayed
5. Updated/added information should appear in the Trainer/Agent/League info section, submitted successfully

title: Verify Phone Number(s) field
custom_steps: Verify the fields for Phone Numbers
custom_expected:
Following fields should be displayed and all should be editable
- Type (Trainer/Agent, League)
- Country
- Phone number
- Default Country code
- Make Primary Button
- Make Same As Trainer button 
- Add button

title: Verify Phone Number(s)
custom_steps:
1. Select Type
2. Select Country
3. Type in Phone number
custom_expected:
1. Options are Trainer/Agent Phone, Parent Phone, Home Phone, Cell Phone
2. With Selecting a country the default country code should change to appropriate numbers
3. Should only be able to type in 20 characters

title: Verify Make Same As Trainer button - Phone Number(s)
custom_steps: Click Make Same As Trainer button at the top left part of the Phone Number(s) section
custom_expected:
Type will change to Trainer/Agent Phone

Trainer/Agents information will be added into fields

title: Verify Add button - Phone Number(s)
custom_steps:
Click on Add Number button in the Phone Number(s) section
Click on Trash Bin icon on a phone number set.
Verify result
custom_expected:
Additional Phone number fields should are displayed.

Each type may only be selected once.

Clicking trash bin icon should remove additional phone number set. At least one set must be present at all times.

title: Verify Email Address(es) field
custom_steps: Verify the fields for Email Addresses
custom_expected:
Following fields should be displayed and all should be editable
- Type (MLB Club, Parent, Player, Trainer/Agent)
- Email
- Make Primary radio button
- Make Same As Trainer button
- Add button

title: Verify Email Address(es)
custom_steps:
1. Select Type
2. Type in Email Address
custom_expected:
1. Options are MLB Club, Parent, Player, Trainer/Agent
2. Email must be valid

title: Verify Make Same As Trainer button - Email Address(es)
custom_steps: Click Make Same As Trainer button at the top left part of the Email Address(es) section
custom_expected:
Type will change to Trainer/Agent Phone

Trainer/Agents information will be added into fields

title: Verify Add button - Email Address(es)
custom_steps:
Click on Add button in the Email Address(es) section
Click on Trash Bin icon on a email set.
Verify result
custom_expected:
Additional Email fields should are displayed.

Each type may only be selected once.

Clicking trash bin icon should remove additional Email Address set. At least one set must be present at all times.

title: Verify Attached File(s) fields
custom_steps: Verify the fields for Attached File(s)
custom_expected:
Verify there is a:
-Browse Button
-Add Button

title: Attaching Files
custom_steps:
1. Click the Browse or Add button (Photos should be taken or selected from camera roll of documents to check clarity and legibility)
2. Click Use Photo Button
3. Verify Fields
4. Label File
5. Register

*Dominican Republic, Venezuela, Panama, United States or Brazil are the ONLY countries that do not require a consent form, ALL OTHER COUNTRIES DO*
custom_expected:
1. Click Browse button if picture is already save to iPad. Click Add button if user needs to take picture.
2. Brings you back to Player profile page with file attached
3. File Name, Label, Last Modified, Size, Comments and a trash can should be visible
4. Label options are Birth Certificate and/or National ID, Miscellaneous, and Registration Consent Form
5. should NOT be able to register without Birth Certificate and Registration Consent Forms

**SHOULD ADD MORE THAN ONE DOC TO EACH PLAYER PROFILE

Clicking trash bin icon should remove document.

title: Verify a Consent form is NOT needed for specific countries
custom_preconds:
Have a player created from the Dominican Republic, Venezuela, Panama, United States or Brazil 
*These are the ONLY countries that do not require a consent form file*
custom_steps:
1. Click the Browse or Add button (Photos should be taken or selected from camera roll of documents to check clarity and legibility)
2. Click Use Photo Button
3. Verify Fields
4. Label File
5. Register
custom_expected:
1. Click Browse button if picture is already save to iPad. Click Add button if user needs to take picture.
2. Brings you back to Player profile page with file attached
3. File Name, Label, Last Modified, Size, Comments and a trash can should be visible
4. Label options are Birth Certificate and/or National ID, Miscellaneous, and Registration Consent Form
should NOT be able to register without Birth Certificate for players from these countries

title: Verify National Id Number(s)
custom_preconds: Not a required field for creating a new player
custom_steps:
1. Click Add button
2. Verify Fields
3. Select Country
3. Select Type
5. Fill in Number
custom_expected:
1. National ID Number section should be expanded 
2. Country, Type, Number, and garbage can icon should be visible
3. Selected country should determine type and if ID number has a required format
4. There should only be one option
5. Field should work appropriately 

If garbage can icon is selected,and message will appear asking if user is sure they want to delete National ID
-If user chooses yes, ID is deleted

title: Verify National ID Format is correct for Australia
custom_steps:
1. Create New Player
2. Fill in all required fields making the player from Australia
3. Enter a National ID for player using the format: #### ##### # (4Numbers 5Numbers 1Number)
4. Click Register
custom_expected:
1. Blank player page displays
2. Fields work appropriately
3. Fields work appropriately 
4. Player is registered

title: Verify Player does not register for incorrect National ID - Australia
custom_steps:
1. Create New Player
2. Fill in all required fields making the player from Australia
3. Enter National ID using the format ## ### ### ##
4. Click Register
custom_expected:
1. Blank player page displays
2. Fields work appropriately
3. Fields work appropriately 
4. Player is NOT registered

title: Verify National ID is Required and Format is correct for Curacao
custom_steps:
1. Create New Player
2. Fill in all required fields making the player from Curacao
3. Enter a National ID for player using the format: ########## (10Numbers)
4. Click Register
custom_expected:
1. Blank player page displays
2. National ID field gains a red asterisk and fields work appropriately
3. Fields work appropriately
4. Player is registered

title: Create new trainer agent
custom_steps:
1. Locate New Trainer/Agent tab on left side of app
2. Fill in required Fields
3. Click Next
custom_expected: After clicking 'Next', Trainer/Agent profile should be displayed in edit mode. Data from the widget should be populated into the profile.

title: Verify Trainer/Agents are created successfully
custom_steps:
1. With profile still in edit mode, fill in all required fields
2. Click Register to submit trainer/agent
custom_expected:
1. Trainer/agent is created and user is brought back to the New Trainer/Agent tab.
2. On the Submissions tab, the player created should be at the top of the list with a status of "Ready."

title: Verifying Submissions
custom_steps: Locate and go to Submissions tab on left side of app
custom_expected:
Information should be divided into Entered Date, Type, Name, Status 

If trainer and players are created they should be divided into a Trainer Clipboard and a Player Clipboard, Never combined under one.

title: Verify Status
custom_steps:
1. Register/submit a player/trainer
2. Save a player/trainer
3. Sync player/trainer
custom_expected:
1. Status should read "Ready"
2. Status should read "Preliminary"
3. Status should read "Synced"

title: Going Online
custom_steps:
1. Create players / trainers
2. Log out of App
3. Connect app to internet
4. log back onto App
custom_expected:
1. Player / trainers should be successfully registered / submitted
2. user is brought to app login page
3. iPad should be connected to wifi
4. User is brought to app

title: Verify Sync
custom_steps:
1. Go to Submissions Tab
2. Verify player / trainers status
3. Check off player/ trainer
4. Click Sync button
5. Verify player / trainers status
custom_expected:
1. Player / trainers should appear on submissions page
2. Status should be "Ready"
3. Check box, located on right side of player / trainer status, should become highlighted
4. Prompt should appear " __ items were submitted"
5. Status should now read "Synced"

title: Make sure players / trainers synced properly
custom_steps:
1. Sync players / trainers
2. Check status reads "Synced"
3. Log onto ebis environment (DEV or TRN) as club-boc-intl/club-boc-intl
4. Go to Club Registration Widget
5. Use filter to search for player*
6. Go to Trainer/Agent widget
7. Use filter to search for trainer/agent*
8. Verify player/trainer is on list
custom_expected:
Players created and synced should appear on the club registration list widget 

Trainer/agents create and synced should appear on the trainer/agent widget

*Make sure you are in international amateur

title: Verify Delete Button
custom_steps:
1. Go to Submissions Tab
2. Check off player/ trainer
3. Click Delete button
4. Click Delete button again
5. Verify player / trainers is deleted
custom_expected:
1. Player / trainers should appear on submissions page
2. Check box, located on right side of player / trainer status, should become highlighted
3. Prompt "Are you sure you want to delete this object"
4. Player should be deleted
5. Player/Trainer should be removed from list

title: Verify Status : Synced
custom_steps:
1. Sync players created in the offline app
2. Verify status
3. Edit player
custom_expected:
Once players are synced, their status should read "Synced." 

Users should NOT be able to edit players information

title: Sync from Server
custom_steps:
1. Begin to Create New player
2. While creating player click 'Sync to Server' on the bottom left
3. Click Yes
custom_expected:
Immediate sync with the system server to update info. 

*This helps with matching and newly entered trainer/agents*

title: Toggle to View/Hide Synced Items
custom_steps:
1. Toggle button to hide synced items (should be switched on the right)
2. Toggle button to show synced items (should be switched on the left)
custom_expected:
1. Synced items disappear
2. Synced items reappear

title: Offline - Sync
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Click Yes
3. Select two or three players with the status of "Ready" and click Sync at the bottom
custom_expected:
1. Message "You are not connected to the internet. Would you like to continue in offline mode?
2. Logged in Offline
3. Message shows: "You are currently offline. Please log out and log back in when you are connected to the Internet"

title: Large group sync
custom_steps:
1. Create and Register 100+ new players on the application
2. Verify their status
3. Check all players (all button located at bottom left of page)
4. Sync 
5. Time how long the syncing takes
custom_expected:
All of the 100+ items should be submitted successfully within a decent time frame*

*under 10 minutes

title: Losing and regaining connection
custom_steps:
1. Go to a place with unreliable wifi, ex. Starbucks
2. Sync players created on offline app
3. Try to lose connection
4. Once connection is regained, sync players
custom_expected:
1. Connect to wifi, log into app.
2. Players should sync at the same rate they would in the office. 
3. Internet connection is lost.
4. Players should sync without having to log off and log back into the app. Message show which players were submitted successfully and which were not (if any).

*Some players will be synced successfully before connection is lost and have a status of synced*

title: Losing connection while signing on
custom_preconds: Must be connected to the Internet and in an area where Internet connection is easily lost
custom_steps:
1. Log into app as BOC while having somewhat of an Internet connection
2. Lose the Internet connection as you're logging in
custom_expected:
1. App attempts to log user on.
2. Message displayed stating; "You are not connected to the Internet. Would you like to continue in offline mode?"

title: Unreliable connection
custom_preconds: Must be connected to an open source wifi (ex. HomeRun)
custom_steps:
1. Login to the wifi under Settings button on iPad (For MLBAM use, "HomeRun"- Guest/Guest)
2. Log into the app, as BOC
3. Create and sync some players 
4. Lose Internet connection from server (For MLBAM, HomeRun)
custom_expected:
1. Logged onto wifi
2. App opens
3. Players are created and synced
4. Connection is lost, in order to gain connection again, user must open up wifi settings and retype in username and password

*Username and Password window to reconnect does not show up on app*

title: Verify Matching Players
custom_preconds: Verify if a match occurs when a duplicate player is created on the application.
custom_steps:
1. Log onto App
2. Create New Player
3. Fill in required fields 
4. Register Player
5. Create duplicate Player
6. Click Register
custom_expected:
1. log in as club-boc-intl/club-boc-intl
2. Fill in required fields
3. User is brought to edit mode, fill in required fields
4. User is brought back to New Player page
5. Fill in fields with same information as player created in step 2
6. User is brought to a potential match page with list of matches

NOTE: This should work whether the first player created is synced or not.

title: Verify Matching Players
custom_preconds: Verify match occurs with a player synced from ebisdev to app
custom_steps:
1. Log onto https://ebistrn.mlb.com/
2. Create New Player
3. Fill in required fields
4. Register Player
5. Log onto application as BOC
6. Sync saved data from the server, Click Yes
7. Create new player, fill in same info as Step 2
8. Click Register
custom_expected:
1. log in as club-boc-intl/club-boc-intl
2. Fill in required fields
3. Player is in edit mode, fill in required fields
4. Prompt appears that player was saved successfully
5. Dashboard displayed 
6. Prompt appears
7. Info entered appropriately 
8. User should be brought to a Potential Matches page with duplicate players

title: Verify Matching Players
custom_preconds: Verify synced player from app matches with player created in ebisdev
custom_steps:
1. Log onto app
2. Create New Player
3. Fill in required fields
4. Register Player
5. Sync Player
6. Prompt appears
7. Log onto https://ebistrn.mlb.com/
8. Create new player
9. Click Register
custom_expected:
1. log in as club-boc-intl/club-boc-intl
2. Fill in required fields
3. Player is in edit mode, fill in required fields
4. User is brought back to New Player tab
5. Go online (wifi) and sync player
6. Items were uploaded 
7. log in as club-boc-intl/club-boc-intl
8. Fill out same information as player created in step 2
9. User should be brought to a Potential Matches page with duplicate players
